text: Florinda Meza García (born 8 February 1949) is a Mexican actress, television producer, and screenwriter.[ Esmas - Biografia de Florinda Meza] She is best known as Doña Florinda in El Chavo del Ocho, La Chimoltrufia in Chespirito, and other various roles in El Chapulín Colorado. Meza was married to Roberto Gómez Bolaños from 2004 until his death in 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Television producers Category:People from Zacatecas
title: Florinda Meza
